price: Pengikut-pengikut mereka menjawab, "Sebenarnya kamulah.  Tiada ucapan selamat datang bagimu karena kamulah yang menjerumuskan kami ke dalam azab, maka amat buruklah Jahanam itu sebagai tempat menetap".
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِكُمۡۖ أَنتُمۡ قَدَّمۡتُمُوهُ لَنَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرَارُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal antum lā marḥaban bikum antum qaddamtumūhu lanā fabi'sa al-qarāru
